commit message: * Added decimal for max_ratio.
* Added Seeding icon
* Added Seeding logic
* Added translations for Seeding drawer menu
* Seeding drawer menu implemented - it closes #55

* Removed saveQBittorrentOptionValues method. All values are saved by sharedpreferences UI
* Changed default values for global download, alternative upload and alternitive download rate, mac num conn per torrent, max num uploads per torrent preferences preferences
* Fixed java.lang.NullPointerException in com.lgallardo.qbittorrentclient.OptionsActivity.saveQBittorrentOptionValues issue. It closes #67
* Removed code saveQBittorrentOptionValues method
* Added string for Maximum number of upload slots per torrent

* Added Global Maximum number of upload  in Options xml
* Added Global Maximum number of upload  in Options Activity
* Added forcedUP state when filtering seeding torrents
* Added forcedUP state when filtering completed torrents
* Added Global Maximum  translations
* First implementation of the X509TrustManager fix for Google Play alert

* Switch to SDK and tools version 23.0.0
* Added suport for http-client legacy
* Added nbsp-team/MaterialFilePicker
* Added first implementation for keystore file picker
* Added basic detection for keystore path

* Added English translation for self-signed certificate
* Added keystore password preference
* Added support for keystore preference value in Settings
* Added  support for self-signed certificate
* Added  translations for self-signed certificate

* Fixed the use of an unsafe implementation of the X509TrustManager interface with the Apache HTTP client. It closes #6 and should silent Google Play alerts. Now a BKS keystore is needed to be able to use self-signed certificates
* Removed debug comment
* Fixed android.database.CursorIndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 0 requested, with a size of 0 issue. It closes #72
* Fixed java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'java.util.ArrayList com.lgallardo.qbittorrentclient.RSSFeedChannelListAdapter.getRssChannels(). It closes #69
* Added support for opening not valid torrent or magnet links in browser. It fixes #63
* First implementation for the Dangerous permissions
* Added request of  dangerous permissions for Android 6+ API23+ (Thanks Roberto Herreros)

* Added request of  dangerous permissions for Android 6+ API23+ (Thanks Roberto Herreros). It fixes #65
* Removed logs comments for dangerous permissions
* Added filter for bks files in self-singed certificate keystore

Release 4.2.9

* Added Seeding menu
* Added support for self-signed certificates
* Added request of dangerous permissions for Android 6+ API23+
* Added decimals for max_ratio
* Added Global Maximum number of upload in Options
* Added support for opening not valid torrent or magnet links in browser
* Fix unsafe implementation of https
* Fixed RSS issues
* Fixed saving Options issues
* Fixed opening files issues
*
